description: This file defines the main React component for the Integrations page, which displays available connectors, handles connection and disconnection actions, and manages UI state and effects related to connector data fetching.

methods.name: IntegrationsPage
methods.description: React functional component rendering the integrations page, managing state and effects for connectors and handling user actions.

methods.name: onConnect
methods.description: Initiates OAuth login flow for a specified connector ID.

methods.name: onDisconnect
methods.description: Disconnects a specified connector by ID and updates the UI state.
